title: Understanding Cut and Paste
text: To move cells using cut and paste, you need to first select the cell or range of cells you want to move.

title: Using the Cut Command
text: After selecting the cells, use the 'cut' command to remove them from their original location.

title: Pasting the Cells
text: Navigate to the new location where you want to place the cells and use the 'paste' command to insert them.

hintAnswer: select a cell, then press "cut". At the desired destination, select "paste"
title: Complete the Steps
text: What are the steps to move cells using cut and paste?
choices: select a cell, then press "cut". At the desired destination, select "paste"
CTRL "cut," and then "paste" on the home tab
